error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.title: Create offer shell API Trace

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

requestBody.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace
Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

view.title: Customer one signs up and logs in
view.subtitle: Primary customer account created.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.title: Customer one signs up and logs in Snapshot

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

requestBody.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.title: Customer one books primary offer API Trace

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.
